name: appveyor-swagger
description: An unofficial Swagger/OpenAPI definition of the AppVeyor REST API.
author: Kevin Locke <kevin@kevinlocke.name>
//: All scripts should run in POSIX sh and Windows cmd.exe

scripts.postpublish: git -C doc push && git push --follow-tags origin master gh-pages && echo Remember to update GitHub Releases from CHANGELOG.md && echo until skywinder/github-changelog-generator#56 is fixed.
scripts.postversion: rimraf doc && git clone -b gh-pages -l -q . doc && npm run doc && git -C doc add . && git -C doc commit -n -m "Docs for v$npm_package_version"
scripts.prepare: js-yaml swagger.yaml > swagger.json && js-yaml swagger-polymorphic.yaml > swagger-polymorphic.json
scripts.preversion: depcheck --ignore-dirs doc && david && git-branch-is master && travis-status -b -c -qwx
scripts.validate: npm run validate-cli && npm run validate-oav && npm run validate-openapi-generator && npm run validate-online
scripts.validate-cli: swagger-cli validate swagger.yaml && swagger-cli validate swagger-polymorphic.yaml
scripts.validate-oav: oav validate-spec swagger.json && oav validate-spec swagger-polymorphic.json
scripts.validate-openapi-generator: openapi-generator-cli validate --recommend -i swagger.yaml && openapi-generator-cli validate --recommend -i swagger-polymorphic.yaml
scripts.validate-spectral: spectral lint swagger.yaml && spectral lint swagger-polymorphic.yaml
scripts.version: sed -i.bak "1,20s/^\(  version:\) 0\.[0-9.]*$/\1 $npm_package_version/" swagger.yaml swagger-polymorphic.yaml && rm swagger.yaml.bak swagger-polymorphic.yaml.bak && github_changelog_generator -t "$npm_config_gcg_github_token" --future-release "$npm_package_version" && echo && echo === Please edit CHANGELOG.md as desired, then exit === && echo && $npm_config_shell && git commit -m "Update CHANGELOG.md for $npm_package_version" CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "Update OpenAPI spec version to $npm_package_version" swagger.yaml swagger-polymorphic.yaml
scripts.version-deps: npm install david depcheck git-branch-is travis-status
